verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they had come out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H5375><s%> a census <S%H7218><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> every male, <S%H2145><s%> one by one; <S%H1538><s%>

from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who are able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%> You and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall number <S%H6485><s%> them by their divisions. <S%H6635><s%>
With you there shall be a man <S%H376><s%> of every <S%H376><s%> tribe; <S%H4294><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>' house. <S%H1004><s%>
These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> who shall stand <S%H5975><s%> with you: <S%H7205><s%> Of Reuben: Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur. <S%H7707><s%>
Of Simeon: <S%H8095><s%> Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai. <S%H6701><s%>
Of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab. <S%H5992><s%>
Of Issachar: <S%H3485><s%> Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar. <S%H6686><s%>
Of Zebulun: <S%H2074><s%> Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon. <S%H2497><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> Of Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%> Of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur. <S%H6301><s%>
Of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni. <S%H1441><s%>
Of Dan: <S%H1835><s%> Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai. <S%H5996><s%>
Of Asher: <S%H836><s%> Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran. <S%H5918><s%>
Of Gad: <S%H1410><s%> Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Deuel. <S%H1845><s%>
Of Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%> Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan. <S%H5881><s%>"

These are those who were <S%H7148><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers; <S%H1><s%> they were the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of <S%H1992><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> these men <S%H582><s%> who are mentioned <S%H5344><s%> by name. <S%H8034><s%>

They assembled <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> together <S%H6950><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the second <S%H8145><s%> month; <S%H2320><s%> and they declared their ancestry <S%H3205><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> one by one. <S%H1538><s%>
As Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so he numbered <S%H6485><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> one by one, <S%H1538><s%> every male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> - six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of it, <S%H4557><s%> according to the number of the names, <S%H8034><s%> one by one, <S%H1538><s%> every male <S%H2145><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> - nine <S%H8672><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> were seventy <S%H7657><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> - four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> - seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>
those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>
those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> were sixty <S%H8346><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Asher, <S%H836><s%> were forty <S%H705><s%> - one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> their generations, <S%H8435><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the names, <S%H8034><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> to war; <S%H6635><s%>

those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> were fifty <S%H2572><s%> - three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

These are those who were numbered, <S%H6485><s%> whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered, <S%H6485><s%> and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> being twelve <S%H6240><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> they were each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H259><s%> for his fathers <S%H1><s%>' house. <S%H1004><s%>

So all those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> all who were able to go out <S%H3318><s%> to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%>
even all those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty. <S%H2572><s%>
But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> after the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among them. <S%H8432><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Only the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> you shall not number, <S%H6485><s%> neither shall you take <S%H5375><s%> a census <S%H7218><s%> of them among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

but appoint <S%H6485><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> over the Tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and over all its furnishings, <S%H3627><s%> and over all that belongs to it. <S%H5375><s%> They shall carry the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and all its furnishings; <S%H3627><s%> and they shall take care <S%H8334><s%> of it, <S%H2583><s%> and shall encamp around <S%H5439><s%> it. <S%H4908><s%>

When the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> is to move, <S%H5265><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall take it down; <S%H3381><s%> and when the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> is to be set up, <S%H2583><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall set it up. <S%H6965><s%> The stranger <S%H2114><s%> who comes near <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall pitch their tents, <S%H2583><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> by his own camp, <S%H4264><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> by his own standard, <S%H1714><s%> according to their divisions. <S%H6635><s%>

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the Tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Testimony, <S%H5715><s%> that there may be no wrath <S%H7110><s%> on the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be <S%H8104><s%> responsible <S%H4931><s%> for the Tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Testimony. <S%H5715><s%>"
Thus the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did. <S%H6213><s%> According to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so they did. <S%H6213><s%>
